div1.p: Know all Men by this Presents that we wm g hall and wm pursly are held and firmly bound unto Edmond Wiliams high Shff of said county his admrs. and asigns in the penial Sum of one thousand pounds currant money of this state to which Payment well and truly to be maid and Dune we Bind our Selves our heirs haecutrs admrs. and asigns firmly by these presents sailed with our Sale and Dated this sw Dcr 1788

The conditions of the above obligation is such that if the above bound wm g hall shall make his Personall apperance before the justices of our next county court of pleas and quarter sisans to be held for Said county then and thar to answer wm hall in a plea of Slander to his Damage five hundred pounds and not Depart the Same with Leave then this oblagations to Be voyd otherwise to Remain in full force and venture in Sold
